snippet: New releases from the bachata group Vena, the rapper Ka, the soul singer Jai Paul, the dancehall master Popcaan and the garage rockers Bleeding Knees Club.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews music from Vena, Ka's album Grief Pedigree, Nothing to Do from Bleeding Knees Club, Jai Paul's Jasmine and Popcaan's Only Man She Want.
lead_paragraph: New releases from the bachata group Vena, the rapper Ka, the soul singer Jai Paul, the dancehall master Popcaan and the garage rockers Bleeding Knees Club.

headline.seo: New Releases From Ka, Popcaan, Vena and Bleeding Knees Club
headline.main: Bachata Royalty, Long-Haul Rapper, Australian Brats
headline.print_headline: Bachata Royalty, Long-Haul Rapper, Australian Brats
